pageContent: Background: People with advanced cancer require a range of health, social and informal care during the final phases of life. The cost of providing care to this group as they approach the end of their lives is unknown, but represents a significant cost to health and social care systems, charities patients and their families.

metaData.source:
Influence of Geography on Prostate Cancer Treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33316361/
